casebody.data:
Walter Miller, Respondent,
v.
BMW of North America, LLC, et al., Defendants, Hennessy Industries, Appellant. Motion No: 2017-1076 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on January 11, 2018

In the MATTER OF NEW YORK CITY ASBESTOS LITIGATION.

Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
